display_long_description:
Game Description
The CEO of a biotech company mysteriously vanishes one morning. As a determined journalist, you sneak into his mansion to investigate, only to find yourself trapped in a creepy bathroom. Each clue and puzzle brings you closer to uncovering the truth—but the deeper you go, the darker the secrets become.

This escape room is a test of wit, courage, and observation. Solve puzzles, uncover a sinister conspiracy, and escape before time runs out.

Game Features
Gripping Narrative: A story full of twists and hidden secrets.
Immersive Environment: Tense atmosphere with detailed designs and sound.
Challenging Puzzles: Solve intricate puzzles with keen observation.
Psychological Tension: Every revelation brings more danger.
Complete VR Experience: Intense first-person perspective.

Gameplay
Explore and Observe: Examine the environment for clues.
Solve Puzzles: Unlock barriers and piece together the mystery.
Uncover the Truth: Discover the secrets behind the CEO’s disappearance.
Survive and Escape: Stay calm and find the way out.

Ideal Players
Fans of mystery and puzzles.
Thrill-seekers looking for a chilling experience.
Those who enjoy story-driven gameplay.
Ready to face your fears and uncover the truth? The challenge awaits!

Controls
Hold the A button to move.
Press the grab button to interact with objects.
